text: Avanti! is a 1972 Italian American romantic comedy movie directed by Billy Wilder, and starring Jack Lemmon, Juliet Mills and Clive Revill. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 comedy movies Category:1972 romance movies Category:1972 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Italian romance movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Billy Wilder
title: Avanti!
